table.name: vtiger_orders
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_orders` ( `ordersid` int(11) default NULL, `ordersname` varchar(255) default NULL, `orders_no` varchar(100) default NULL, `startdate` date default NULL, `targetenddate` date default NULL, `actualenddate` date default NULL, `targetbudget` varchar(255) default NULL, `ordersurl` varchar(255) default NULL, `ordersstatus` varchar(100) default NULL, `orderspriority` varchar(100) default NULL, `orderstype` varchar(100) default NULL, `progress` varchar(100) default NULL, `linktoaccountscontacts` varchar(100) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_orderscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_orderscf` ( `ordersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ordersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
